name: raccoon
text: this idea paid for my condo

name: biznart
text: I used a somewhat less savory idea to buy my van.

name: saint
text: try what I did. only $10k up front.

name: carlyle
text:
I keep waaiting to get far enough away from the strip to use this line and people will chubby me for the 'great reference' or 'lol'. But you always crop up.

Oh well. Some day, I will be famous on Assetbar. Some day...

name: dusty
text:
Saint made a comment, it was so chubbied that I wished I had made it instead of him. I have to get control of this.

(o )carlyle( o)

name: carlyle
text: You don't understand, dusty. Assetbar. Chubbies. Lames. Ten inch cat dicks and when they are and are not considered classy to show them. Achewood. This is my life.

name: saint
text: I think it is my calling to be a one-trick pony.

name: carlyle
text: Then keep on keepin' on, man. You're doing a Great Job.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: I get it.

text: Do you? [I]Do you?

name: phantomsword
text:
Crap...
Do you?

text: Suckin' dick?

text: No but seriously, why do they walk bow-legged?

text: I want to know too, but I'm definitely not paying $8 to find out.

text: because they ride horses, people.

name: norrin
text: Nice. Although I would have paid the $8 for it.

text: The shocking truth!

name: tekende
text: That's a very dapper horse.

name: belgand
text: I'll go one further and call that horse swank.

name: belgand
text: FUCK YOU IN THE FACE ASSETBAR! I WILL DESTROY YOU WITH BEAMS FROM MY DAMN EYES!!

name: atticusonline
text: HTML HAS NO PLACE IN BBCODELANDVILLE

name: lexsenthur
text: BB Coddle and Vile?

name: streever
text: You've been here too long to have no idea how bbcode works, pal.

name: woodenteeth
text:
The Lorikeet on his hat is whispering "The guy with the camera over there said your mother was a mule".

Totally looks like he's squinting accusingly.

name: belgand
text: Hmm... I got the impression that he was looking at us as if to say "Yeah, I know I'm the shit".

name: scorpio_nadir
text: The Lorikeet is whispering "Today is the day the Godfather wants you to return a favor. You must come in 3rd in the 5th at Belmont today."

name: hyetal
text: I stand corrected.

name: morgulon
text: CUNNILINGUS!?

name: hellofditties
text: However, a good cowgirl keeps her calves together...

name: thegoodwillgirl
text: But a bad cowgirl doesn't.

name: thegoodwillgirl
text: In response to myself: I read your comment too quickly, and I missed the "good" part. Without that, my comment would have been witty. Instead, I'm just an asshole. Whoops.

name: theguitarhero
text: Actually no, that's basically a logical thing to say.

name: boredom_man
text: Also, there are no good cowgirls.

name: theguitarhero
text: Also, all cowgirls are sluts.

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
Our first inklings that Chris Onstad straight up HATES Hunt's ketchup. He thinks guys like Showbiz and Bensington Butters (hicks) eat this kind of ketchup.

I mean, he's RIGHT, he just shouldn't say it out loud.

name: nice_enuf_guy
text: He should hate Hunts. The ketchup universe begins and ends with H E I N Z. Not that I feel strongly about the subject...

name: jeet
text: I believe for that comment you deserve 57 chubbies.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Man, try living in a town with a Heinz factory in it.

Every August just smells like vinegar. Grosssss.

name: jeet
text:
I live in a town with an ex-Heinz factory in it.
Now they are luxury lofts.

name: mattylite
text: Good things come to those who wait.

name: atticusonline
text: Ok the fact that this is one year later and he has exactly 57 chubbies freaks me the fuck out.

name: hyetal
text: Who added the 58th?  Shame on you.

name: atticusonline
text: Philippe is not amused.

name: mattylite
text: But... but he looks amused .?

name: atticusonline
text: Damn you!

text:
HP

MOTHERFUCKING

SAUCE

text:
This is the ketchup chain of class:

Hunts

Red Gold

name: carlyle
text: Somewhere at the bottom is that 'Fancy Ketchup' crap you get on the cheap plastic tables set up outside the rib restaurant that's uncomfortably close to the dumpsters.

name: mockereo
text:
i would not eat at such a terrible restaurant, ever.

you could not make me.

text: Oh man, I forgot about that! Nice call.

text: alt text: That is the mother of all unmotivated duffel drops

text: That is Jaime the Science friend's moustache.

text: Maybe they are amigos!

name: farqussus
text: He best be careful.

name: atticusonline
text: joo wonner why? Jaime wonner too!

name: tellumo
text:
As I was cleaning my apartment today, I came across a cardboard divider from a case of wine and flipped it around a bit while thinking of this strip.

Anyone in the Bay Area want to go as Showbiz for Halloween? Give me a call.

name: molesticide
text: if they did, why would they need your help?

name: tellumo
text: Well, in case they wanted the divider. For their costume.

name: i_love_kate
text: Yeah, those things are straight-up hard to come by.

name: lizjones
text: The raised eyebrow in the last panel really sold this one for me.

name: cdl146
text: Somebody actually made this. http://youtube.com/watch?v=rw-Op5sSxSg

name: dak
text: Well, it's just a divider thing you would find in a box of bottled drinks.

name: closefriend
text: The "I started this joke and I will finish it for money" business is a venture that promises millions. Just look at Vlad.

name: tekende
text: Vlad charges less, though, and in this manner will outsell his competition.

name: imbeta
text: ha ha ha ha - "yo amo jesus cristo" LOL

name: spinynorman
text: To me, Showbiz is dancing and bobbing as he changes the sign.

name: aliiis
text: check his bad eyebrow, dude!

name: qeramah
text: haha--showbiz is all *flit* taDA!

name: epicurus
text: Man, everyone knows a guy like Showbiz - just mix and match in new hair and country of origin and dumb nickname.

name: bilingualmonkey
text: Bumped up to a 5 for the strength of the alt

name: hellofditties
text:
Flit flit twip flit!
The intensity on his face in the last panel.
Showbiz is a true artist. I would give him my money.

name: singtralala
text: never thought of showbiz as a genius. now i do.

name: rykan
text:
I've been working in a wine shop for over a year now; not ONCE did this idea occur to me.

I know what I'm doing tommorow.

name: aliiis
text: wine shop hi-five! I don't any more but I did for a long time, and made like maybe a million billion of those damn dividers. and never did anything funny with them. : (

name: connormc
text: I love how indignantly Showbiz flips the sign over in the last panel.

name: carlyle
text: Showbiz, for all his faults, has a good idea.

name: mg7810
text: It is interesting how Showbiz has similar engineering chops to Roast Beef, just pointed in the sort of direction that he'd see a wine divider and make it into a four-sided sign for panhandling.
